mapper.insert: insert into tbl_comment_metion_alarm (id, comment_id, mentioned_member_id) values (#{id}, #{commentId}, #{mentionMemberId})
mapper.select: select c.post_id from tbl_alarm a join tbl_comment_alarm ca on a.id = ca.id join tbl_comment c on ca.comment_id = c.id where alarm_receiver_id = #{alarmReceiverId}

select post_id, member_nickname from tbl_alarm a JOIN tbl_post_alarm pa ON a.id = pa.id JOIN tbl_post p ON pa.post_id = p.id join tbl_personal_member pm on p.member_id = pm.id join tbl_follow f on f.follow_receiver_id = p.member_id WHERE a.alarm_receiver_id = #{alarmReceiverId}

select alarm_sender_id, member_nickname, file_path from tbl_alarm a join tbl_follow_alarm fa join tbl_personal_member pm on fa.alarm_sender_id = pm.id join tbl_member_profile mp on pm.id=mp.member_id join tbl_file f on f.id = mp.id where alarm_receiver_id = #{alarmReceiverId}
select c.post_id from tbl_alarm a join tbl_comment_metion_alarm cma on a.id = cma.id join tbl_comment c on cma.comment_id = c.id where alarm_receiver_id = #{alarmReceiverId}
